content: ***learn how to knit the cable stitches without a cable needle *** *welcome to the cables made simple - potholder kal* i have designed many patterns with cables and i rarely use a cable needle once i discovered how to knit cables without a cable needle my love of knitting cables intensified i feel that knitting cables has become quicker and much more efficient honestly it changed a lot of things for the better i decided that i wanted to create a knit-a-long to help you learn how to knit these cables without a cable needle i thought about it for a while and decided that i would design pot holder patterns using the basic cable stitches each potholder will have many cables when you finish knitting the potholder you will have used the cable stitch many time over and we know that repetition helps us learn **the best thing about this kal is that is is free ** you do not have to pay anything to join all you need is yarn and needles you don t even need a cable needle within each pattern i will create a video tutorial to illustrate how to work each of these cables without a cable needle each pattern will be released on a monday **jan 26th ** c2f potholder **feb 9th ** c2b potholder **feb 23rd ** c2lp potholder **mar 9th ** c2rp potholder **mar 23rd ** c4f potholder **apr 6th ** c4b potholder **apr 20th ** c4lp potholder **may 4th ** c4rp potholder **may 18th ** multi cable potholder **june 1st ** multi cable potholder **yardage ** 40 yards 36 m per potholder **yarn ** any worsted weight yarn **gauge ** 18 stitches x 26 row = 4 10 cm x 4 10 cm in stockinette stitch **needles ** 5 mm 8 us or size needed to get gauge kal will be hosted on my ravelry group knotenufknitting knit-a-longs /groups/knotenufknitting-knit-a-longs as well as in my facebook group knotenufknitting knitalongs on facebook https //www facebook com/groups/150731285684438
